Posts.Content: I really agree about the positivity thing, I think when people say that to me it is more for them than me. Being positive won't change my outcome. Nor will prayers.  But I think we need to give ourselves, our bodies and our health care workers  a huge amount of credit for the effort we are making to keep our cancers at bay. Even when we  dont feel like it our bodies are using their defence mechanisms to get rid of the cancer or at least to stop it growing. Our doctors and nurses and researchers are doing their best to find treatments that will help our bodies do that. Sadly sometimes it doesn't work and the cancer takes over but that is not for want of trying.  Our bodies are trying even when we feel we have nothing left to give. Not all wars are won but that doesn't make the soldiers any less strong, willing or brave. It just means the other side broke the rules and brought  a frigging nuclear missile.  We should feel proud of ourselves for getting through one more day against the adversity called Cancer  Love and hugs to you all xx
Posts.Title: The phrase " kicked cancers Ass"

Posts.Content: I like to think I have given it a good kick with all the treatment.  Even if its not kicked to touch it must at least be feeling a bit bruised  Hope you all get to see a bit of sun today xx
Posts.Title: The phrase " kicked cancers Ass"

Posts.Content: I can totally relate to that. I even got "Gosh that went quick" when someone happened to contact me just as I finished chemo. And yet I remained polite
Posts.Title: The phrase " kicked cancers Ass"

Posts.Content: Just found this thread and felt so inspired I immediately jumped up to go out for a walk.  Then saw its pouring with rain. Oh well maybe later.  But still a wonderful thread. Hope to be able to post my own daffodil pictures soon. Thank you to everyone who posts on here.  Ive found it so helpful over the past 10 months.  You are all amazing Catherine xx
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: All you ladies are amazing  Inspired to go for a walk yesterday in between the rain showers and today have ordered myself a fitness tracker so I too can challenge myself to more steps.  Thank you for being here and helping me though the difficult days ️
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness
